report.//ouputDir: please remove // and set the right path here

1001.name: MissingSignerCheck
1001.description: The account is missing signer check

1002.name: MissingOwnerCheck
1002.description: The account is missing owner check

1003.name: IntegerAddOverflow
1003.description: The add operation may result in overflows

1004.name: IntegerUnderflow
1004.description: The sub operation may result in underflows

1005.name: IntegerMulOverflow
1005.description: The mul operation may result in overflows

1006.name: IntegerDivOverflow
1006.description: The div operation may result in overflows

1007.name: UnverifiedParsedAccount
1007.description: The account is not validated before parsing its data

1010.name: TypeFullCosplay
1010.description: These two account data types are fully compatible and can be used to launch type confusion attacks

1011.name: TypePartialCosplay
1011.description: These two account data types are partially compatible and may be exploited by type confusion attacks

1014.name: BumpSeedNotValidated
1014.description: The account's bump seed is not validated and may be vulnerable to seed canonicalization attacks

1015.name: InsecurePDASharing
1015.description: The PDA sharing with these seeds may be insecure

1017.name: MaliciousSimulation
1017.description: The program may contain malicious simulation

1019.name: UnvalidatedAccount
1019.description: The account may not be properly validated and may be untrustful

2001.name: IncorrectLoopBreakLogic
2001.description: Loop break instead of continue (jet-v1 exploit)

2004.name: IncorrectDivisionLogic
2004.description: Incorrect checked_div instead of checked_ceil_div (spl-token-swap vulnerability: stable curve division)

2005.name: IncorrectTokenCalculation
2005.description: The token amount calculation may be incorrect. Consider using the reserves instead of the balances.
